channel.title: Cloud on Home

item.title: Playlist Generator
item.description: Playlist Generator An app that uses semantic search to generate afrobeat song playlists from input texts This is a side project where I built an end-to-end machine learning application that uses a sentence transformer model hosted as a model-as-a-service. It is a simple recommendation system that tries to find afrobeat songs about a user’s sentiment by comparing the user’s text inputs to song lyrics and then return the most similar songs.
